question.altText: Bolehkah kami bertanya dan membagikan informasi yang didapat kepada pihak-pihak yang berkepentingan?

help.text: Introduce about the Enumeratorâ€™s name, role. Debrief about Spice Up: is a project provides technical advise through mobile App, irrigation & fertilizer advice, crop planning, market information.

question.text: Can we ask you a number of questions and use the information in the report for our project monitoring and share it to our donors ?

question.altText: Nama
question.text: Name

question.altText: Usia
question.text: Age

question.altText: Jenis Kelamin
question.text: Gender

question.altText: Lokasi
question.text: Location

question.altText: Komentar, diisi jika nama desa tidak ada di pilihan.
question.text: Comments, if village is not in cascade

question.altText: Survey lokasi
question.text: Survey location

question.altText: Area lahan

help.text: Only done when farmers in the field and when possible
help.altText: Hanya dilakukan saat petani ada di kebun atau saat memungkinkan

question.text: Farm area

question.altText: Ada berapa anggota keluarga bapak/ibu?

help.text: Count all the people in the house.
help.altText: Tolong hitung semua anggota keluarga yang tinggal di rumah bapak/ibu.

question.text: How many household members are there?

question.altText: Apa semua anggota keluarga yang berusia 6-18 pergi ke sekolah?
question.text: Do all household members ages 6 to 18 go to school?

question.altText: Apa pendidikan terakhir kepala keluarga?

option.value: Grade school (incl. disabled, Islamic, or non-formal)
option.text: Grade school (incl. disabled, Islamic, or non-formal)

option.value: Junior-high school (incl. disabled, Islamic, or non-formal)
option.text: Junior-high school (incl. disabled, Islamic, or non-formal)

option.value: High school (incl. disabled, Islamic, or non-formal)
option.text: High school (incl. disabled, Islamic, or non-formal)

question.text: What is the highest level of education that the head of household has completed?

question.altText: Apa kepala keluarga bekerja?

option.value: Business owner with only temporary or unpaid workers
option.text: Business owner with only temporary or unpaid workers
option.altText: Pemilik bisnis dengan pekerja tidak tetap

option.value: Business owner with permanent or paid workers
option.text: Business owner with permanent or paid workers

question.text: What was the employment status of the head household?

question.altText: Apa bahan baku utama dari lantai rumah?
question.text: What is the main material of the floor?

question.altText: Apa jenis wc/toilet di rumah Anda?
question.text: What type of toilet arrangement does the household have?

question.altText: Jenis bahan bakar untuk memasak?

option.value: Gas/LPG, kerosene, electricity, others, or does not cook
option.text: Gas/LPG, kerosene, electricity, others, or does not cook

question.text: What is the main cooking fuel?

question.altText: Apakah di rumah ada tabung gas 12 kg?
question.text: Does the household have a gas cylinder of 12 kg or more?

question.altText: Apakah di rumah ada kulkas?
question.text: Does the household have a refrigerator or freezer?

question.altText: Apa punya motor?
question.text: Does the household have a motorcycle, scooter, or motorized boat?

question.altText: Apa memiliki akses ke hp?
question.text: Do you have phone access?

question.altText: Berapa jumlah smartphone yang dimiliki keluarga?
question.text: How many smart phone are available at your home?

question.altText: Apa tipe hp yang dipakai/dipinjam?
question.text: What type of phone do you use?

question.altText: Apa ada jaringan internet di rumah?
question.text: Do you have internet access at home?

question.altText: Apa ada jaringan internet di kebun?
question.text: Do you have internet access at your pepper farm?

question.altText: Sudah berapa lama bapak/ibu menjadi petani lada?
question.text: How long you've been a pepper farmer?

question.altText: Berapa hektar luas lahan lada bapak/ibu?

help.text: Please just put '999' if the respondent did not remember the land area
help.altText: Jika responden tidak ingat berapa jumlah luas lahan, tulis angka '999'.

question.text: How much your land area?

question.altText: Berapa banyak pohon lada yang bapak/ibu punya pada saat awal tanam?
question.text: How much pepper trees do you have in the beginning of the plantation?

question.altText: Berapa banyak pohon lada yang bapak/ibu punya saat ini?
question.text: And how much pepper trees do you have now?

question.altText: Berapa meter jarak pohon lada dalam baris?
question.text: How many meters the space between the pepper trees (in line)?

question.altText: Berapa meter jarak pohon lada antar baris?
question.text: How many meters the space between the pepper trees (between line)?

question.altText: Berapa hektar luas lahan untuk tanaman yang lain (yang tidak berada dalam 1 area dengan pohon lada)?

help.text: Please write the kind of crops and their land area: e.g: (palm oil/2, vegetables/5)
help.altText: Tolong sebutkan jenis tanaman dan luas lahannya! FORMAT PENULISAN, contoh: (kelapa sawit/2, sayuran/5)

question.text: Land area for other crops (in acres) that located in different area with pepper trees

question.altText: Berapa kg lada yang bapak/ibu produksi pada panen kemarin?
question.text: How much kg pepper did you in the last harvest session?

question.altText: Dan berapa harga jual lada putih kering per kg nya? - Dalam Ribu

help.text: So Rp 50,000 will just be written as '5'

question.text: And how much your white pepper net selling price in the last harvest session per kg (in Thousands)?

question.altText: Dan berapa harga jual lada hitam kering per kg nya? - Dalam Ribu

help.text: So Rp 50,000 will just be written as '5'

question.text: And how much your black pepper net selling price in the last harvest session per kg (in Thousands)?

question.altText: Bagaimana rata-rata harga jual lada dibanding dua musim panen sebelumnya?
question.text: How was the average price/kg of the harvest selling this season compared to the 2 previous harvest seasons?

question.altText: Bagaimana kualitas panen dibanding dua musim panen sebelumnya?
question.text: How was the quality of the harvest this season compared to the 2 previous seasons?

question.altText: Bagaimana tingkat gagal panen dibanding dua musim panen sebelumnya?

option.value: Post-harvest losses were about the same
option.text: Post-harvest losses were about the same

option.altText: Lebih banyak tanaman yang gagal panen
Lebih sedikit tanaman yang gagal panen

question.text: How were post-harvest losses this season compared to the 2 previous seasons?

question.altText: Dalam menyiapkan lahan, langkah apa yang dikerjakan?
question.text: When you prepared the land, which parts below that you considering? (please select all that apply!)

question.altText: Darimana bapak/ibu mendapat sumber air untuk lahan?
question.text: What are the water resources you use in your farm?

question.altText: Berapa rupiah yang dihabiskan untuk pengairan? (dalam Juta)

help.text: The cost will include the fuel for water pumps
help.altText: Jumlah termasuk harga pembelian dan pemakaian pompa air

question.text: How much do you spend on irrigation (in Million)?

question.altText: Apa jenis bibit yang ibu/bapak punya?
question.text: What is the kind of seeds you have?

question.altText: Bagaimana bapak/ibu mendapat bibit untuk tanaman?

option.value: Prepare it from own parent plant
option.text: Prepare it from own parent plant
option.altText: Menyiapkan bibit dari tanaman induk sendiri

question.text: Where did you get the seeds for your plants?

question.altText: Jika membeli bibit, apa alasannya?

option.value: The amount of my seeds is not enough
option.text: The amount of my seeds is not enough

question.text: If buy the seeds, what is the reason?

question.altText: Jika menyiapkan dari tanaman induk sendiri, apa alasannya?

dependency.answer-value: Prepare it from own parent plant

option.value: I have my own parent plant
option.text: I have my own parent plant

option.value: The quality of outsider seeds is not guaranteed
option.text: The quality of outsider seeds is not guaranteed
option.altText: Kualitas bibit dari luar tidak terjamin

option.value: Because I get the seed's aid from government
option.text: Because I get the seed's aid from government
option.altText: Karena mendapat bantuan bibit dari pemerintah

question.text: If preparing from your parent plant, what is the reason?

question.altText: Apa jenis tajar yang digunakan?
question.text: Which one that you used for helping the propagation of your trees: cover trees or woods?

question.altText: Jika memakai tajar hidup, apa alasannya?

option.altText: Bisa mendapat penghasilan tambahan dari tajar hidup

question.text: If using cover trees, what is the reason?

question.altText: Jika memakai tajar mati, apa alasannya?

option.value: Food competition if using cover trees
option.text: Food competition if using cover trees
option.altText: Pohon lada dan tajar hidup akan bersaing dalam mencari makanan

option.value: Can be used as soon as possible
option.text: Can be used as soon as possible

question.text: If using the woods, what is the reason?

question.altText: Berapa kali bapak/ibu rata-rata pergi ke kebun lada per minggu?
question.text: How often did you monitor your farms in a week?

question.altText: Apa jenis pupuk yang dipakai?
question.text: What kind of fertilizer did you use? (Please select all that apply!)

question.altText: Tolong pilih merk pupuk yang paling sering digunakan!
question.text: What is the brand? Please chose the most 3 brands that you used!

question.altText: Dan berapa rupiah yang dihabiskan untuk membeli pupuk dalam sekali masa tanam sampai panen? - dalam Juta

help.altText: Contoh: 1 juta akan ditulis '1'. Jika memakai koma, tulis koma sebagai titik. Contoh: 1.5

question.text: How much did you spend for all of these fertilizers? - In Million

question.altText: Mengapa bapak/ibu memilih pupuk jenis ini?

option.value: Produce available in the local area
option.text: Produce available in the local area

question.text: Why do you use these fertilizers? (please select all that apply!)

question.altText: Apa bapak/ibu mengerti perbedaan fungsi dari tiap pupuk?
question.text: Did you understand the different function of different fertilizers?

question.altText: Apakah bapak/ibu pernah mendapat bantuan untuk menganalisa kesuburan tanah?
question.text: Have you ever got land analysis assistance/training to measure your soil fertility?

question.altText: Apa informasi mengenai tanah yang bapak/ibu sangat butuhkan?

option.value: What factors contribute to soil fertility ?
option.text: What factors contribute to soil fertility ?
option.altText: Apa saja yang mempengaruhi kesuburan tanah?

option.value: How can I improve the quality of my farm soil ?
option.text: How can I improve the quality of my farm soil ?

option.value: How do you make bad soil into good soil ?
option.text: How do you make bad soil into good soil ?
option.altText: Bagaimana mengubah tanah tidak subur menjadi subur?

question.text: What kind of information regarding soil nutrition that you really need but hard to obtain?

question.altText: Dan apa yang menyebabkan informasi itu susah didapat? (pilih semua jawaban yang berlaku)

option.altText: Tidak ada sumber informasi yang tersedia

option.value: Did not know where to ask
option.text: Did not know where to ask
option.altText: Tidak tahu harus bertanya pada siapa

question.text: And what makes that information hard to get? (please select all that apply!)

question.altText: Ada di fase apa kebun lada bapak/ibu sekarang?
question.text: In what farming phase are you in now?

question.altText: Dan di tahap ini, seberapa sering tanaman lada terkena hama & penyakit?
question.text: And on that phase, how often is your crop being affected by pests?

question.altText: Apa hama yang paling sering menyerang tanaman lada bapak/ibu?
question.text: Which main pest that often happen in your farm?

question.altText: Apa penyakit utama yang paling sering menyerang tanaman lada bapak/ibu?
question.text: Which main disease that often happen in your farm?

question.altText: Dan saat terkena hama, berapa pokok yang terkena?
question.text: And when affected, how much of your field affected by it?

question.altText: Apakah ibu/bapak menggunakan pestisida?
question.text: Did you use pesticides?

question.altText: Apa merk dari pestisida yang digunakan (tolong sebutkan 3 merk utama yang digunakan)!

help.altText: contoh FORMAT: (fastak,mipsin) - Dipisah oleh koma tanpa spasi

question.text: What brand of pesticides that you use? (please mention the 3 most brand used)!

question.altText: Dan berapa rupiah yang dihabiskan untuk semua pestisida dalam sekali masa tanam hingga panen? - (dalam Juta)
question.text: How much did you spend for pesticides from the beginning of planting period until harvesting? - in Million

question.altText: Mengapa Anda menggunakan jenis pestisida ini? (tolong pilih semua jawaban yang berlaku!)

option.value: Produce available in the local area
option.text: Produce available in the local area

option.altText: Kualitas lebih baik dari pestisida yang lain

option.value: Suitable in handling the pest & disease
option.text: Suitable in handling the pest & disease

question.text: Why do you use these pesticides? (please select all that apply!)

question.altText: Apa informasi tentang hama & penyakit sangat dibutuhkan tapi sulit didapat?

option.value: What kind of pesticide to use
option.text: What kind of pesticide to use

option.altText: Berapa jumlah pestisida yang harus digunakan

option.value: How to treat the invected plants
option.text: How to treat the invected plants

question.text: What kind of information regarding pest & disease that you really need but hard to obtain?

question.altText: Dan apa yang menyebabkan informasi ini sulit untuk didapat? (tolong pilih semua jawaban yang berlaku!)

option.value: Did not know where to ask
option.text: Did not know where to ask

question.text: And what makes that information hard to get? (please select all that apply!)

question.altText: Apa bapak/ibu pernah mendapat pelatihan/pendampingan tentang hama & penyakit?
question.text: Did you ever get mentoring/assistance regarding pest&disease?

question.altText: Apa keluarga bapak/ibu adalah pemilik lahan lada yang digarap sekarang?
question.text: Did your household own your farming land?

question.altText: Jika ya, apa bapak/ibu yang memiliki lahan tersebut?

option.altText: Ya, saya adalah pemilik lahan tersebut

option.value: Yes, jointly with the spouse or other household member
option.text: Yes, jointly with the spouse or other household member
option.altText: Ya, milik bersama suami/istri saya (dan anggota keluarga yang lain)

question.text: If your household own the land, did you own any of it?

question.altText: Berapa jam dalam sehari bapak/ibu menghabiskan waktu untuk bertani?
question.text: How many hours a day did you spend on the farm?

question.altText: Apakah bapak/ibu memiliki pekerjaan lain selain bertani lada? (misal: pekerjaan rumah tangga)
question.text: Did you have any other works besides pepper farming? (including housework)

question.altText: Jika ya, berapa jam dalam sehari dihabiskan untuk pekerjaan lain?
question.text: If yes, for how many hours?

question.altText: Di kegiatan pertanian apa biasanya bapak/ibu terlibat?
question.text: Which one of the farming activities that you usually involved in? (Please select all that apply!)

question.altText: Dan di kegiatan tersebut, siapa yang biasanya membuat keputusan?

option.altText: Biasanya saya lebih banyak dalam membuat keputusan

option.value: Equal say between spouse and self
option.text: Equal say between spouse and self

option.altText: Anggota keluarga lain yang mengambil keputusan

question.text: And on those activities, who normally take the decision?

question.altText: Apakah kelompok terkait pertanian yang bapak/ibu ikuti?
question.text: Which farming-related group that you are involved in?

question.altText: Dimana biasanya bapak/ibu mendapat informasi soal pertanian? (tolong pilih semua jawaban yang berlaku!)
question.text: How did you usually get the information regarding your farming activities? (please select all that apply!)

question.altText: Jika ibu mendapat informasi dari media, jenis media apa yang digunakan?
question.text: If you get the information from the media, which media you used?

question.altText: Seberapa sering bapak/ibu mencari informasi tentang pertanian dari internet?
question.text: How often did you search for farming information on the internet?

question.altText: Seberapa butuh bapak/ibu dengan informasi cuaca?
question.text: How often do you need climate & temperature information?

question.altText: Seberapa butuh bapak/ibu dengan informasi tentang pemupukan?
question.text: How often do you need fertilizer advice?

question.altText: Seberapa butuh bapak/ibu dengan informasi tentang pengolahan tanah?
question.text: How often do you need soil management advice?

question.altText: Seberapa butuh bapak/ibu dengan informasi tentang penyiapan lahan?
question.text: How often do you need land preparation advice?

question.altText: Seberapa butuh bapak/ibu dengan informasi tentang pengairan (drainease &irigasi)?
question.text: How often do you need water management (drainage and irrigation) advice?

question.altText: Seberapa butuh bapak/ibu dengan informasi tentang penanganan hama?
question.text: How often do you need pest & disease management advice?

question.altText: Seberapa butuh bapak/ibu dengan informasi mengenai panen & pasca-panen?
question.text: How often do you need harvest & post-harvest advice?

question.altText: Dan dari jenis informasi tersebut, informasi apa saja yang menurut bapak/ibu sulit didapat?
question.text: And from those list above, what kind of information that you think is hard to get? (please select all that apply)

question.altText: Jenis Info terpenting (rangking 1)
question.text: Most Important Information (Rank 1)

question.altText: Jenis Info terpenting (rangking 2)
question.text: Most Important Information (Rank 2)

question.altText: Jenis Info terpenting (rangking 3)
question.text: Most Important Information (Rank 3)

question.altText: Jika ada aplikasi handphone yang bisa meningkatakan hasil produksi, apakah anda mau mencobanya?
question.text: If there's any app that could help you increase your farm production, will you use it?

question.altText: Namun jika apikasi tersebut berbayar (dengan harga murah), apakah anda akan tetap mencobanya?
question.text: But how if you need to pay for it with small price?

question.altText: Apa ibu/bapak mendapat bantuan dari LSM/pemerintah?
question.text: Do you receive support from NGO / government projects?

question.altText: Apa bentuk bantuan yang didapatkan tersebut ?
question.text: What kind of support?

question.altText: Dari semua biaya untuk penanaman lada, biaya apa yang butuh modal paling besar?
question.text: From all of the farming cost, which one that needs biggest capital?

question.altText: Selama 3 tahun terakhir ini, apa bapak/ibu punya cukup modal untuk menanam lada?
question.text: Did you have enough capital for your pepper farm in the past 3 years?

question.altText: Dan jika modal untuk menanam lada tidak cukup, apa yang bapak/ibu lakukan?

option.value: Reduce the number of pepper trees
option.text: Reduce the number of pepper trees

option.altText: Mengganti tanaman lada dengan tanaman lain

option.value: Switch to be palm oil/rubber plantation workers
option.text: Switch to be palm oil/rubber plantation workers

question.text: And if your capital is not enough, what did you do?

question.altText: Jika meminjam uang, dimana ibu/bapak meminjam uang?
question.text: If borrow the money, where did you borrow?

question.altText: Selama 3 tahun terakhir ini, seberapa sering ibu/bapak meminjam uang untuk modal menanam lada?

dependency.answer-value: From the boss (the middleman)|From the bank|From the family

question.text: How often you borrow the money for your capital in the past 3 years?

question.altText: Dan selama 3 tahun terakhir ini, seberapa sering pinjaman bapak/ibu disetujui?

dependency.answer-value: From the boss (the middleman)|From the bank|From the family

question.text: And how often your loan is approved in the past 3 years?

question.altText: Selama 3 tahun terakhir, apakah hasil panen ibu/bapak cukup untuk membayar hutang?
question.text: In the past 3 years, did your harvest can cover your debt?

question.altText: Dan apabila cukup, apa ibu/bapak masih mendapat keuntungan?
question.text: And if yes, after paying the debt, did you still get a profit?

question.altText: Apa ada koperasi simpan pinjam untuk petani disini?
question.text: Is there any saving-credit cooperative for the farmers here?

question.altText: Jika ada koperasi simpan pinjam, kemana ibu/bapak akan meminjam uang?
question.text: If there is a saving-credit cooperative, which one will you go to to borrow money?

question.altText: Geo-lokasi
question.text: Geo-location

question.altText: Catatan perbaikan (jika ada)
question.text: Notes

question.altText: Foto

help.text: Farmer's photo and their field (if possible)

question.text: Photo
